name: Lowa Nabucco Evo Gore-Tex Winter Boots - Men's
description: Solid warmth and traction for when winter hits. The Nabucco Evo's high cuff and insulated, waterproof lining keep your feet warm and dry when adventuring in deep snow. The Vibram Arctic Grip soles are specifically designed for traction on snow and ice, so you stay firmly planted on slippery sidewalks and icy ponds alike.Nubuck leather and synthetic fabric protect feet from winter scrapes.Gore-Tex® Partelana lining offers cozy comfort while keeping feet dry.Thermal insole prevents cold seeping in from below.Injection-moulded PU midsole with nylon stabilizer supports and cushions your feet.Vibram® IceTrek rubber with Arctic Grip sole technology grips to slippery winter surfaces.
